name: Specification and application of air source heat pumps
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Covering domestic to social housing to commercial scale projects, this session looks at the practicalities of where air source heat pumps are best installed; what considerations to take into account when specifying and installing an ASHP; what pitfalls to look out for; how to ensure your ASHP’s performance dovetails into a building’s overall strategy for low carbon low-cost energy provision.

presentations.name: Air source heat pumps: current and future
Specification, and performance monitoring of ASHP
presentations.speakers: Donald Daw, Commercial Director, Mitsubishi Electric

presentations.name: Specification and performance of ASHP in social housing applications
presentations.speakers:
Mark Houghton, Commercial Director, Space Air Solutions Ltd
Clive Jude, Maintenance Manager, Wiltshire Rural Housing Association
